title: I, with Unlimited Investments, was Admired By All Sects – Wonder Novels
Summary:
Li Xun crossed the Xuanhuan world and awakened the infinite investment system.
 
From then on, his life changed forever.
 
"Fellow Daoist, are you one step away from a breakthrough into the Qi Nourishing Realm, right? I have exactly one Spiritual Qi Nourishing Pill here, which can help you!"
 
[Congratulations on your successful investment, host. You gained 20 years of cultivation!]
 
"Daoist friend has been severely injured and hurt his foundation? I have a Daoist Golden Pill here, which will help you recover your damaged foundation!"
 
[Congratulations on your successful investment, host. You obtained an Imperial sword]
 
…
 
 
Many years later.
 
Tai Xuan Emperor: "In the past, if not for my Daoist friend Li Xun, who gave me a cultivation technique, how could I have achieved what I have achieved today? In the future, those who oppose him will be my enemies, Tai Xuan Emperor!"
 
The Inevitable Nation's Lord: "That year I was chased by my enemies. Fortunately, my Daoist friend Li Xun saved my life. From today onwards, he is my friend. His enemy is my enemy!"
